column4: Well, I hope someone can help I've done everything except compile new ALSA drivers...
I have NO sound on 7.04
whats the probl....
has it ever worked? Has it worked with another OS?
It works with Vista
paste the results of "lspci" into http://pastebin.ca for me.
http://pastebin.ca/492452
paste "lsmod" for me now
I'm running ALSA 1.0.13 I have appended the option for my intel hda in the.. kk
http://pastebin.ca/492458
thats your other device besides intel HDA?
Conexant CX20549 (venice) (OSS Mixer) AND HDA Intel (Alsa mixer)

yes but i don't know what it is... other than different version of same thing... I did up the volumes on everything both devices and even checked in # alsamixer although only the conexant shows up in the alsamixer command

: yes but i don't know what it is... other than different version of same thing... I did up the volumes on everything both devices and even checked in # alsamixer although only the conexant shows up in the alsamixer command
anything in dmesg or /var/log/messages?
: nothing in dmesg that relates to audio just some bluetooth stuff
: not any relavent msgs in /var/log/messages | messages.0
install aumix and try it w/that mixer
thats weird man. Maybe someone else has some ideas.
: and switches all switched too ^-^
: oh... how do I restart alsa? I have rebooted a few times after trying things but that was the whole system for other changes made aswell
: I don't have an alsa in /etc/init.d/
: restart didn't help i'll try aumix
